channel.title: I need help using Includes
channel.description: Hey, well I get the gist of everything but I just need a little help. Okay so I understand that includes are need to run scar with all scripts. How do i use a include when I want to run a script. I mean do I open the include in a text doc or scar doc. Or do i just leave it. Also when I download SRL include how do i put it in the correct place to use it. Where do I save it? Thanks for anyone that can help me out.

item.title: I need help using Includes
item.dc:creator: @tonekray tonekray
item.description:
@tonekray wrote:

Its an old script Try getting a new one with the SRL include. Other than that its and old script ya.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help using Includes
item.dc:creator: @Sailbird69 Sailbird69
item.description:
@Sailbird69 wrote:

I have one script that ask for SSI2.txt and BoxBreaker.txt. I have them both installed from the File section under download includes. From my scar. The script says it is running but I see nothing Happening. I believe im doing everything right, can you fill me in on what may be wrong. I provided a download. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: I need help using Includes
item.dc:creator: @tonekray tonekray
item.description:
@tonekray wrote:

nope is a .scar

Read full topic

item.title: I need help using Includes
item.dc:creator: @Sailbird69 Sailbird69
item.description:
@Sailbird69 wrote:

wow you just cleared everything up. So my SRL should be saved as an .scar not a .txt. because .txt is how everything else is saved

Read full topic

item.title: I need help using Includes
item.dc:creator: @tonekray tonekray
item.description:
@tonekray wrote:

You dont need to use and include when you are running the script. You just want to make sure you have the include for the script in your Includes folder. The SRL Include goes into your includes folder. Example: C:/Documents And Settings/TK/Desktop/Scar 2.03/Includes/SRL

Inside that SRL Folder you sould have the srl.scar and all the folders that came with it

Read full topic

Also when I download SRL include how do i put it in the correct place to use it. Where do I save it? Thanks for anyone that can help me out.
